content.body: is there a transform for the current decorator proposal yet
devsnek: https://javascriptdecorators.org/ exists, though I don't think it has perfect fidelity
content.formatted_body: devsnek: https://javascriptdecorators.org/ exists, though I don't think it has perfect fidelity

content.body: The Babel plugin will probably be released around the end of the year (we have a minor release every two months, and the transform is not ready yet for the next minor)

content.body: honestly i don't think anyone would complain if decorating a function made it not hoist
I would? Not hoisting is really annoying in non-trivial files, since it means the contents of your functions imposes an ordering on the functions themselves.
It's why I almost never do the `const fn = x=>...;` thing that all the kids are doing these days.
content.formatted_body: It's why I almost never do the const fn = x=>...; thing that all the kids are doing these days.
